details:
This update for go1.10 fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2019-6486: A CPU denial of service vulnerability affecting P-521 and P-384 elliptic curves was fixed.

Other fixes:

- go1.10.8 (released 2019/01/23) security release fixes CVE-2019-6486.
- Enable build for %arm (bsc#1125768), with go1.4 as building 
  with gccgo hangs (bsc#974800)
